titles.title: A bill for the relief of Olious W. Mitchell.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 5/17/1988--Introduced. Allows a named individual, notwithstanding certain time limitations, to bring a claim for a Postal Savings System deposit and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay any amount due on such claim.
